head.supplied: ¶ I now enclose the Barons letter to you asking if the name of the Mountain could be changed from Mt Von Mueller to Mt Sir Ferdinand — I asked Mr [Goyder], through Mr Jones, and his reply was "that i...

div.p: A38, letter book, Royal Geographical Society of Australasia (Victorian Branch), Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

To proof.
See also D. Lindsay to A. Macdonald, 4 March 1893.
I now enclose the Barons letter to you asking if the name of the Mountain could be changed from Mt Von Mueller to Mt Sir Ferdinand — I asked Mr [Goyder], through Mr Jones, and his reply was "that it was too late to make any alteration to the map as the required number had been printed" — You know that it is easy to add to maps but you cannot take anything off a lithograph — The other mountian dedicated to the Baron is called Mt Mueller I called mine Mt Von Mueller .
